title: "Plots"
output: html_notebook

NEAT Generation Plots
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

neat.dynamic<- read.csv('finalists/neat_dynamic.csv')
neat.static<- read.csv('finalists/neat_static.csv')



ggplot(neat.dynamic, aes(x=generation, y= meanFitness)) + 
  geom_point()


neat.dynamic.mean <- neat.dynamic %>%
  select(generation, meanFitness)

neat.dy.mean.plot<- plot(neat.dynamic.mean, aes(x=generation, y= meanFitness))

  geom_line()+
  geom_point()+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=neat.dynamic$minFitness, ymax=neat.dynamic$maxFitness), width = .2, poisition = position_dodge(0.05))
  
  ggplot(neat.dynamic, aes(x=generation, y= meanFitness))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=minFitness, ymax=maxFitness), width = .2, poisition = position_dodge(0.05))

?ggplot

```
